post:
Howdy folks!

I hope you are all doing just fine. I wanted to post an offer here and spread love.

If you are not familiar with us, here's a great opportunity for you to try us out for cheap!

**One dollar VPS from VPSDime:**

    1 vCPU
    1GB Fully Dedicated Memory
    10GB Storage (Enterprise grade SSDs in RAID10)
    1TB Traffic Limit
    1Gbps Uplink
    1 Public IP Address
    Optional IPv6 Address
    Virtuozzo 7 Based (TL&DR: Supports Docker)
    2N Power Redundancy
    Highly Optimized Premium Network (Level3, GTT, NTT, Telia, Cogent)
    72 Hour Money Back Guarantee

**Make it yours here:** https://vpsdime.com/onedollar

**The public promotion has ended. There is a special stock reserved for LES people only. PM me to order.**

_Offer is valid while supplies last._

Need something bigger? Check https://vpsdime.com for our regular plans.

**Quick & Dirty AUP:**
    
    Minecraft
    Torrents
    TOR
    Crypto Mining
    Mass Mailing
    Traffic Generation

ARE forbidden.

**Enjoy!**
